pr_title: Include scheduling stats of bucketed table to NodeSelectionStats

timeline.message:
Include scheduling stats of bucketed table to NodeSelectionStats

Previously we only took scheduling for unbucketed situation into
consideration for NodeSelectionStats, which is not sufficient.
Now add scheduling stats for bucketed table to NodeSelectionStats
as well.

Include scheduling stats of bucketed table to NodeSelectionStats

Previously we only took scheduling for unbucketed situation into
consideration for NodeSelectionStats, which is not sufficient.
Now add scheduling stats for bucketed table to NodeSelectionStats
as well.

timeline.author: shixuan-fan

timeline.bodyText: Sorry if it is mentioned before, does bucketed table node selection have non-primary preferred node?
timeline.author: shixuan-fan

replies.bodyText: Good question, actually we don't have that for bucketed table node selection; Just primary and non-preferred
replies.author: kewang1024

replies.bodyText: Is it necessary for us to separate bucketed from unbucketed? Can we merge them into existing stats?
replies.author: shixuan-fan

replies.bodyText: yeah, I also thought about that at first, then I feel it would be confusing since unbucketed situation has three status and bucketed has two; thus add those two for easy debugging when we have mixed situation
replies.author: kewang1024
